text: Álvaro Antón Ripoll (born 18 May 1994) is a Spanish footballer who is currently a free agent. In 2014, he played for UD Alzira in the group VI of the 2014–15 Tercera División, the fourth division of Spanish football. He played four times for FC Cincinnati in the 2016 USL season. ==References== ==External links== * * Álvaro Anton Ripoll on FC Cincinnati's website Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:AD Alcorcón B players Category:FC Cincinnati (2016–18) players Category:USL Championship players Category:Spanish footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Álvaro Antón (footballer, born 1994)
